name: Giant Bomb: A Hideo Kojima Game
name_original: Giant Bomb: A Hideo Kojima Game
description:
**My super late submission for Giant ROM 2, a game jam at giantbomb.com's community.

Shaq's head is missing. Upon his search, Drew Scanlon has discovered it was stolen for it's secret nanotechnology. He must get it back to save the world.

You play as GiantBomb.com's Drew Scanlon. Sneak your way through the level and retrieve Shaq's head.

[Action] button = 'E' on keyboard, 'A' on controller
